mapper.sql: id, batch_id, card_num, password, value, invoke_state, invoke_date, invoke_user, invoke_ip,batch_name, type, valid_start, valid_end, create_date, apply_department, apply_person, apply_date, adjunct, check_state, check_department, check_person, check_date, pull_department, pull_person, pull_date, batch_state
mapper.insert:
insert into wfks_accounting.rech_card(id, batch_id, card_num, password, value, invoke_state, invoke_date, invoke_user,invoke_ip) values
(#{item.id},#{item.batchId},#{item.cardNum},#{item.password},#{item.value},#{item.invokeState}, #{item.invokeDate},#{item.invokeUser},#{item.invokeIp})
mapper.select: select c.*,b.*,t.* from wfks_accounting.rech_card c,wfks_accounting.rech_card_batch b,wfks_accounting.card_type t where c.batch_id = b.batch_id and b.type=t.card_code and b.check_state=2 ORDER BY b.batch_name,c.card_num ASC
select c.*,b.*,t.* from wfks_accounting.rech_card c,wfks_accounting.rech_card_batch b,wfks_accounting.card_type t where c.batch_id = b.batch_id and b.type=t.card_code and c.id = #{id}
select c.*,b.*,t.* from wfks_accounting.rech_card c,wfks_accounting.rech_card_batch b,wfks_accounting.card_type t where c.batch_id = b.batch_id and b.type=t.card_code and c.batch_id = #{batchId}
select count(1) from wfks_accounting.rech_card c where c.batch_id = #{batchId}
select sum(value) from wfks_accounting.rech_card where invoke_user=#{userId}
